page.title: 03Fashion in 1985
page.content: Fashion varies depending on the season Some clothes are designed for spring/summer,others for autumn/winter Summer clothes are often made of cotton,a very light weight material. Winter clothes are made from heavier materials such as wool and polyester. The style in 1985 tends to be very loose:baggy trousers,jackets,jumpers and shirts.The rules of fashion are very strange.Ladies may wear skirts, blouses,trousers and shirts.Men may wear trousers,shirts and ties.Both men and women wear jackets.This means some clothes are unisex.Some people have to wear a uniform.This is a set of clothes that people have to wear because of their job.Nurses,doctors, transport staff,postmen and soldiers and many other people have to wear uniform.Some schools have a compulsory uniform for the children.
